item.title: Would this work....?
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

to get rid of more nulls go to client.java

serch for

private boolean packetProcess() {

under that should be

	private boolean packetProcess() {
		if(disconnected) return false;
		try {
			if(timeOutCounter++ > 20) {
				actionReset();
				disconnected = true;
				return false;  }
	
			if(in == null) return false;

			int avail = in.available();
			if(avail == 0) return false;
			if(packetType == -1) {
				packetType = in.read() & 0xff;
				if(inStreamDecryption != null)
					packetType = packetType - inStreamDecryption.getNextKey() & 0xff;

ect ect if you deleat

if(in == null) return false;

would it get rid of more nulls?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 13, 2007, 08:19:45 PM[/size][hr]well would it?
